特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
IMPORTANT NOTICE: This course is conducted in lecture format. Please note the following in light of the ongoing pandemic: assignments will be posted on LUNA throughout the term, along with important announcements about the course -- including which lectures are in person and which are online -- and so it is critical that students log in to LUNA regularly during this course.

* The first three lectures of this course will be offered on-demand. After the course registration is finalized, students will be notified of the course implementation format for the remaining eleven weeks.*

第1回:
Introduction: Course Overview, Key Concepts 
This lecture is in "On-Demand Format" only. (There is no face-to-face lecture for this week. URL for this video lecture will be posted here Sept. 22.)
No Written Assignment Due
